name: Super Swing Block
description:
The floor is lava! Survive 60 Seconds and the floor will move. Keep enough anchor points in play by transferring fuel. Don't let any go to waste! Get to the end to win a super awesome gold medal.

Controls: Left Click to Swing, Right Click to Target Strike, Middle Click or Space to Transfer Fuel

Music from dl-sounds.com

//This game was made for Mini Jam 85
